trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Queen Creek
There were no other sightings in Queen Creek on or around November 12th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsWitnessed a craft that seemed to hover in one spot, with a white light that pulsed in and out. After staying in one spot for roughly two minutes, it darted off to my left at incredible speeds. It later vanished into the horizon. At 6:52 PM, two more craft fitting the description above were spotted. Two lights were visible. The craft took off again at incredible speeds separate of each other, indicating they were not connected. At 7:00 PM, an additional craft was spotted fitting the description of the three separate above. It vanished within 15 seconds.
